[((_strEqual(range_type,`ALIVE))){as long as this entity is present on the stage}]

dis_1.name: point 1
dis_1.tooltip: advanced: ranged revive point 1. Applicable only when revive others is enabled

range_type.name: range type
tooltip: Applicable only when revive others is enabled
0 for effective in range when in normal state.
1 for effective in range when present on the stage.
2 for effective for allies once passed the range as long as it is on the stage.
3 for effective for allies once passed the range forever

revive_non_zombie.name: non-zombie
revive_non_zombie.tooltip: revive non-zombie as well. Applicable only when revive others is enabled

revive_others.name: revive others

TIME.tooltip: Unlike Stop, this ability freezes everything including waves, money gain, cat and enemy cool down, etc

intensity.name: intensity
intensity.tooltip: The power of the timestop. If the intensity is lower than the duration, there will be certain intervals where units will be able to move. Set to negative to speed up entities with time stop immunity

SEAL.tooltip: Seal will disable all abilities except Burrow, Metal, Self-Destruct, Only-Attack, and basic Revive

time.name: duration
time.tooltip: actual duration is subjected to treasure values and traits. Set duration to negative to override only if proc duration is higher

format: [(same_health){each entity will have the same hp as the summoner, }]
[(bond_hp){the summoner's hp will be bound with each summoned entity's hp, }]
[(pass_proc==0){and }]are[(ignore_limit){n't}] restricted by the stage entity limit
[(pass_proc!=0){, and carry all procs from [(pass_proc!=2){the summoner}][(pass_proc==3){ and }][(pass_proc!=1){ each entity hit}]}].
Summoned entities will be in [(min_layer==max_layer){[(min_layer==-1){the same layer as this entity}(min_layer!=-1){layer (min_layer)}]}
animation[((_strEqual(anim_type,`BURROW_DISABLE`))){ and disable burrow for summoned entities}].}]

dis.name: min distance
dis.tooltip: Minimum distance from this entity by default, or from the target if on hit or on kill is enabled

max_dis.name: max distance
max_dis.tooltip: Max distance from this entity by default, or from the target if on hit or on kill is enabled

mult.name: buff
mult.tooltip: Buff of the summoned entity, relative to this entity by default, fixed buff if you enable fix buff

min_layer.name: min layer
min_layer.tooltip: lowest layer the summoned entity will be at. Set to -1 to use same layer as this entity

max_layer.name: max layer
max_layer.tooltip: highest layer the summoned entity will be at. Set to -1 to use same layer as this entity

anim_type.name: summon anim
tooltip: summon animation, 0 for no animation, 1 for warp animation,
2 for burrow animation, 3 for burrow animation and disable further burrow, 4 for entry animation,
5 for attack animation, 6 for Everywhere Door animation.
The summoned entity must have burrow animation in order to use 2 or 3.

ignore_limit.name: ignore limit
ignore_limit.tooltip: ignore the stage entity limit. Be careful with this, don't summon too much. It can break the game

fix_buff.name: fix buff
tooltip: Use fixed buff instead of relative buff.
Ex: 200% summoner and 300% buff would mean 600% buff if fix buff is disabled and 300% buff if fix buff is enabled

same_health.name: same health
same_health.tooltip: Set the summoned entity to have the same health as this entity.

bond_hp.name: Bond health
bond_hp.tooltip: When activated, the summoner will receive all damage and procs the summoned entity receives

on_hit.name: on hit
tooltip: Summon if and only if this attack hits targets.
Summon per target attacked, distance origins are set to the targets' positions.
Multiple summon possible for ranged attack.

on_kill.name: on kill
tooltip: Summon if and only if this attack kills targets.
Summon per target killed, distance origins are set to the targets' positions.
Multiple summon possible for ranged attack.

pass_proc.name: Pass procs
pass_proc.tooltip: Passes all inflicted status to summoned units. 0 = none, 1 = from summoner, 2 = from attacked entities, 3 = from both

form.name: Form
form.tooltip: Set which form of the unit you want to summon. Only applicable on Cat Units.

format: [(hitless){, even if this attack misses}] [(multi!=20){(_left)Gives target (multi)% of activator's damage(_right)}]

multi.name: multi
multi.tooltip:
Percentage of activator's damage.
If multi is 20, it will have 20% of activator's damage. Negative values are allowed

hitless.name: Miss Trigger
hitless.tooltip: Wave will spawn even if this attack misses

inverted.name: Inverted
inverted.tooltip: Start point, end point, and traversal direction are all inverted

pid.name: ID
pid.tooltip: Sets the IDs of miniwave attack, allowing for type-based resistance discrimination

DMGCUT.tooltip: This ability reduces all damage that is below certain amount to zero.
DMGCUT.format: [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to }][(reduction>=0){Reduce}(reduction<0){Increase}][(prob==100){s}] [(traitIgnore){all }]damage lower than [(magnif){(_shield(dmg))}(!magnif){(dmg)}] by (reduction)% [(procs){ and ignore the attack's procs}]

dmg.name: damage
dmg.tooltip: The maximum amount of damage to be negated.

reduction.name: reduction %
reduction.tooltip: Percentage of the damage to reduce it by.

traitIgnore.name: ignore traits
traitIgnore.tooltip: When this is checked, this ability can trigger regardless of the attacker's trait.

procs.name: ignore procs
procs.tooltip: When this is checked, procs from nullified attacks will also be negated.

magnif.name: Use Magnification
magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make armor's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

DMGCAP.tooltip: This ability reduces all damage that is above certain amount to said amount (Or nullifies, if 'nullify damage' is checked).
DMGCAP.format: (prob)% chance to [(nullify){nullify[(traitIgnore){ all}]}(!nullify){set}] damage higher than [(magnif){(_shield(dmg))}(!magnif){(dmg)}][(!nullify){ to [(magnif){(_shield(dmg))}(!magnif){(dmg)}]}(procs){ and ignore the attack's procs}]

dmg.name: damage
dmg.tooltip: The minimum amount of damage to be capped.

traitIgnore.name: ignore traits
traitIgnore.tooltip: When this is checked, this ability can trigger regardless of the enemy's trait.

nullify.name: nullify damage
nullify.tooltip: When this is checked, damage from the attack will be negated instead of set to the amount

procs.name: ignore procs
procs.tooltip: When this is checked, procs from nullified attacks will also be negated.

magnif.name: Use Magnification
magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make shield's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

BARRIER.tooltip: Blocks all damage lower than the barrier's HP. Will break if an attack deals more damage than it's HP

regentime.name: Regeneration Time
regentime.tooltip: The entity's barrier will regenerate after a period of time passes. Set to 0 to deactivate this ability.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.tooltip: The entity's barrier will break after a period of time passes. Set to 0 to deactivate this ability.

magnif.name: Use Magnification
magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make barrier's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

DEMONSHIELD.tooltip: Blocks a certain amount of damage. Unlike barrier, it absorbs damage instead of negating it.
DEMONSHIELD.format: Aku Shield (_left)Shield has (_shield(hp)) HP, regenerates with (regen)% of its original HP when unit gets hitbacked(_right)

regen.name: regen
regen.tooltip: Percentage of the base HP it regenerates upon HB

SHIELDBREAK.tooltip: Directly breaks Aku shield. Be aware that this doesn't prevent shield from regenerating when hitbacked.

format: dealing (damage)% [(!useOwnDamage){of the damage received from an attack [(maxDamage!=0){(_left)Up to (_abs(maxDamage))(_right)}]}
(useOwnDamage){of this unit's damage}] back. [(maxDamage<0){Counter damage will not exceed this unit's remaining HP. }]
the original attack's procs[(procType==2){ with this unit's procs}(procType==3){ and this entity's procs}]. }]
The counter will hit [(areaAttack){ all enemies}(!areaAttack){ only the attacker}][(areaAttack|!outRange){[(!areaAttack){ if they're}] standing
[(minRange!=0|maxRange!=0){(minRange) ~ (maxRange) units away from this entity}(minRange==0&maxRange==0){on this entity's range}]}].

damage.name: Damage%
damage.tooltip: The percentage of damage to reflect when getting hit.

minRange.name: Blindspot
minRange.tooltip: The counter won't hit anything standing below this number. Leave this and Max Range in 0 to use the unit's normal range.

maxRange.name: Max Range
maxRange.tooltip: The counter will hit anything standing below this number. Leave this and Blindspot in 0 to use the unit's normal range.

procType.name: Proc Type
procType.tooltip: The parameter here affects how attack procs are handled. 0 = Removes all procs. 1 = Reflects all procs back to the attacker. 2 = Replaces all the attack's procs with this unit's procs. 3 = Uses both this entity and the attacker's procs. Useless if there's a hit registered as counter

counterWave.name: Counter Waves
counterWave.tooltip: Toggle response when hit with a Wave or Surge. 0 = Do Nothing. 1 = Counter. 2 = Reflect.

useOwnDamage.name: Use Own Damage
useOwnDamage.tooltip: Use this unit's damage for counters instead of received damage.

outRange.name: Ignore Distance
outRange.tooltip: Toggle this on and the unit will counter regardless of how far away the attacker is.

areaAttack.name: Area Attack
areaAttack.tooltip: Toggle this on and the counter will target all units in the counter's range. If left off, only the attacker will receive damage.

maxDamage.name: Damage Limit
maxDamage.tooltip: Counter won't deal more than the specified amount of damage. Set to 0 for no limit. Set to negative number to also cap it to unit's remaining HP

format: a surge attack[(pid){ with (_toString(pid)) IDs}] for (_dispTime(time)) when killed (_left)Created within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range(_right)

spawns.name: Deploy Count

pid.tooltip: Sets the IDs of the surge attack, allowing for type-based resistance discrimination

spawns.name: Kill Count
spawns.tooltip: Amount of kills per surge proc

type.name: type
type.tooltip: +1 for regular cannon immunity, +2 for slow beam immunity, +4 for thunderbolt immunity, +8 for waterblast immunity, +16 for holy blast immunity, +32 for breakerblast immunity, +64 for curseblast immunity

BOUNTY.format: [(mult>0){Extra Money}(mult<0){Theft}] (_left)(_abs(mult))% [(mult>0){more}(mult<0){less}] money received upon defeating enemies(_right)

WORKERLV.tooltip: Increases worker level by a given amount

mult.tooltip: The amount to add. Use negative numbers to decrease worker lv instead

CDSETTER.tooltip: Increases a certain unit's cooldown by a given amount
format: [(slot<0){a random unit}(slot>=0&slot<10){the unit in the lineup's (slot+1)[(slot==0){st}(slot==1){nd}(slot==2){rd}(slot>2){th}] slot}(slot==10){attacked unit}(slot==11){all unit}]'s cooldown

amount.name: increase
amount.tooltip: The amount to add. Use negative numbers to decrease cooldown instead

slot.name: slot
slot.tooltip: The slot of the unit to affect. Use -1 for random, and 10 to make the slot depend on the hit unit, and 11 to affect every unit

type.name: type
type.tooltip: 0 = unit increase, 1 = percentage increase, 2 = set to value

WEAKAURA.tooltip: Decreases morale for all enemies in the given range

min_dis.name: Blindspot
min_dis.tooltip: Below this range, aura has no effect

max_dis.name: Max Reach
max_dis.tooltip: Above this range, aura has no effect

trait.name: Ignore Traits
trait.tooltip: Weakens all enemies regardless of typing if true

STRONGAURA.tooltip: Increases morale for all units in the given range

min_dis.name: Blindspot
min_dis.tooltip: Below this range, aura has no effect

max_dis.name: Max Reach
max_dis.tooltip: Above this range, aura has no effect

trait.name: Ignore Traits
trait.tooltip: Strenghtens all allies regardless of typing if true

skip_self.name: Self-Unaffected
skip_self.tooltip: If true, unit will not be affected by its own aura

REMOTESHIELD.tooltip: Lowers damage of attacks coming from a specified range
format: [(!traitCon){ all}] damage taken from hits originating (minrange) ~ (maxrange) units away from this entity by
damage taken from other units hit by the attack by (_abs(block))%}]}(reduction==0&block!=0){[(block>0){block}(block<0){amplify}]
[(!traitCon){ all}] damage taken from hits originating (minrange) ~ (maxrange) units away from this entity by
(_abs(block))%[(procs){ and block the attack's procs}].}][(waves){Wave/Surge attacks will be affected by this too.}]

minrange.name: Min. Range
minrange.tooltip: Attacks originating closer than this point will not be affected.

maxrange.name: Max. Range
maxrange.tooltip: Attacks originating further than this point will not be affected.

block.name: Block
block.tooltip: Like reduction, but applies to all units

traitCon.name: Focus Traits
traitCon.tooltip: Activate this to make this proc only work if the this unit targets a trait from the attacker

procs.name: Evade Procs
procs.tooltip: Attack's procs won't apply if shield triggers and this is activated

AI.tooltip: Allows the unit to keep away from enemy attacks and fight smarter
format: Strategist [(calcstrongest){ (_left)Unit will seek the most effective attack to use(_right)}]
{enemies are (retreatDist) units away from this entity}],this unit will retreat at (retreatSpeed) speed(_right)}]
[(calcblindspot){ (_left)Unit will not count entities on it's blindspot for attack detection or other effectiveness calculations(_right)}]
[(ignHypno){ (_left)Will not attack hypnotized enemies nor support hypnotized allies(_right)}]

calcstrongest.name: Check Strongest Attack
calcstrongest.tooltip: If this unit has more than one attack pattern, choose an attack based on which will deal the most effective damage instead of randomly

danger.name: Evade Danger
danger.tooltip: Move back if this unit is near an unit that is about to attack

calcblindspot.name: Blindspot Check
calcblindspot.tooltip: Unit will not attack if there's no enemies within the width of it's standing range and blindspot. If retreat is activated, this moves back an unit enters it's blindspot as well

retreatDist.name: Retreat Distance
retreatDist.tooltip: Minimum distance unit's retreat will activate

retreatSpeed.name: Retreat Speed
retreatSpeed.tooltip: Speed used to move back if retreat is activated

ignHypno.name: Ignore the Hypnotized
ignHypno.tooltip: Will not attack hypnotized enemies nor support hypnotized allies

RAGE.tooltip: Enrages the target, making it's attacks hurt both enemies and it's own allies

HYPNO.tooltip: Turns the target against its own allies

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block Rage

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block Hypnosis

MINIVOLC.tooltip: Creates small surge that does exactly same behavior of normal surge, but with less damage
MINIVOLC.format: [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to make}(prob==100){Makes}] a Lv(time/20) Mini Surge[(pid){ with (_toString(pid)) IDs}] within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range[(hitless){, even if this attack misses}] for (_dispTime(time))[(mult!=20){ (_left)Deals (mult)% of attacker's damage(_right)}]

hitless.name: Miss Trigger
hitless.tooltip: Surge will spawn even if this attack misses

pid.name: ID
pid.tooltip: Sets the IDs of the surge attack, allowing for type-based resistance discrimination

DEMONVOLC.tooltip: Creates a surge when hit by a surge with the hitting surge's level and duration
DEMONVOLC.format: [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to make}(prob==100){Makes}] a surge when hit by a surge[(mult!=100){, with (mult)% of the surge's damage}]

DMGINC.tooltip: Increases damage dealt to enemies on the traits this unit targets. Pretty much Massive Damage, but adjustable

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: Actual value is affected by ITF fruits for some traits

DEFINC.tooltip: Decreases damage taken from enemies on the traits this unit targets. Pretty much Resistant, but adjustable

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: Actual value is affected by ITF fruits for some traits

RANGESHIELD.tooltip: Decreases damage taken from either single target or area attacks
RANGESHIELD.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult>0){decrease}(mult<0){increase}] damage taken from [(range){Area}(!range){Single Target}] Attacks by (_abs(mult))%

range.name: Area Attacks
range.tooltip: Activate this to make the shield affect Area Attacks instead of Single Target Attacks

SPIRIT.tooltip: Summons unit with invincibility and self-destruct automatically given, 150 range behind the summoner
format: Summon (_entity(id,form)) as spirit up to (amount) times[(amount>1){s}] per summoner, with a [(amount>1&cd0!=cd1){initial }]cooldown of (_dispTime(cd0))

cd0.name: Initial CD
cd0.tooltip: Minimum and default is 15. Cooldown for the first spirit spawn

cd1.name: Respawn CD
cd1.tooltip: Minimum and default is 15. Cooldown for the second+ spirit spawn

summonerCd.name: CD Penalty
summonerCd.tooltip: Amount of Recharge time to be added (or removed if negative) to the main unit if a spirit is spawned

moneyCost.name: Cost Penalty
moneyCost.tooltip: Makes the spirit cost money to summon (measured in EoC Chapter 1 cost)

animType.name: Animation Type
tooltip: summon animation, 0 for no animation, 1 for warp animation,
2 for burrow animation, 3 for burrow animation and disable further burrow, 4 for entry animation,
5 for attack animation, 6 for Everywhere Door animation.
The summoned entity must have burrow animation in order to use 2 or 3.

inv.name: Invincible
inv.tooltip: Makes unit spirits unkillable, much like the soul ones

METALKILL.tooltip: Decreases metal target's current HP with specified percentage value along with the normal attack too
METALKILL.format: Metal Killer (_left)Decreases (mult)% of target's current HP(_right)

BLAST.tooltip: Creates blast attack that spreads to each side with weaker damage over each blasts
format: [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to create}(prob==100){Creates}] a Level (lv) blast attack[(pid){ with (_toString(pid)) IDs}]
[(lv>1){, with (reduction)% damage reduction per wave}] (_left)Created [(dis_0==dis_1){at (dis_0) range}(dis_0!=dis_1){within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range}](_right)

lv.name: Level
lv.tooltip: BC Default is 3. The higher, the further it reaches

reduction.name: Reduction
reduction.tooltip: BC Default is 30. Determines the amount of damage in % the explosions' damage will be reduced per level

pid.name: ID
pid.tooltip: Sets the IDs of the blast attack, allowing for type-based resistance discrimination

mult.name: percent
mult.tooltip: Set negative to make this unit weak to the effect

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block blast. Set negative to increase the effect.

pid.name: ID
pid.tooltip: Values will only make resistance apply to blast attacks with these ids, if any. Value 0 targets ID-less Blast Attacks

DRAIN.format: [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to absorb}(prob==100){Absorbs}] (mult)% of the damage dealt as HP

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: What percent of damage dealt will be recovered as HP

BLESSING.tooltip: Gives procs and abilities to affected entities. The opposite of curse, essentially
format: [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to bless}(prob==100){Blesses}] units for (_dispTime(time)), granting the blessed entities

abis.name: abilities
abis.tooltip: Like attacks' alt abi, it grants abilities. It can't remove them though

procs.name: Procs
procs.tooltip: Adds the procs on top of the unit's procs

stackable.name: Stackable
stackable.tooltip: Allows multiple blessings to be stacked

traits.name: Added Traits
traits.tooltip: Temporarily adds traits to the blessed entities

REFUND.format: [(count>1){Every (count)th deployed[(prob<100){ has}] }] [(prob<100){(prob)% chance to refund}(prob==100){Refunds}] (mult)% of unit's cost when killed

count.name: Deploy count
count.tooltip: Amount of deploys needed for refund to trigger
